Question.Subject: Want to host my own website?
Question.Content: I want to host a website on my own server. All I need is the domain name. Is there a way to get just that, and not the hosting? One problem with .tk though, when I go to sign up the image that says "type these characters" doesn't display...
Question.ChosenAnswer: Depends what you plan to do. Dot.Tk is a good one for forums. Most others will cost money per month usually. A good one for starting is wetpaint, which is easy to use. I've heard Go Daddy works great, but I have no experience with it.
